game_description: *** Over 15,000 Downloads, thank you ! Get ready for a Galactic Bar Fight! Galactic Bar Fight is a fast-paced arena combat game starting in Pegasus, an intergalactic watering hole in the distant future and then take a tour across the galaxy to various environments all over. Players will be able to complete a variety of our 340+ challenges in both our pegasus hub where they can destroy training droids, practice shooting holograms, observe Hologram stage performers, and more. As well as the in-combat challenges players will be randomly served. Within the bar arenas players will creatively dispatch enemies using blasters of all types. Featuring 13 unique weapons to Slash , smash , deflect, dissolve, burn , and split your enemies. and using Powerups to tip the edge in combat in their own favor. All feedback is welcome - come help shape the future of Galactic Bar Fight as we continue to expand the feature set with suggestions from the community!
review_1: I played this over the weekend and it’s still got some work to be done , Fun to pick up and play , Easy tutorial, Then a choice of 3 levels in difficulty It’s not Drunken bar fights just remember that Martin76x
review_2: So I played this game and was very disappointed but I played it recently and was super stoked to see how much fun it has become Only thing I would say is add more maps and enemy types maybe even a climbing ability
review_3: The game has good mechanics on the line of the point and move system but tbh it’s a little bland, Ik the weapons are going to get better but it’s too early to release this game to the public because it will just give it a bad reputation from the start, better character models are needed, better sounds better room scaling better brightness just overall needs to be better, has a lot of potential if you would keep it in dev stages and not release it, overall good job guys
review_4: I love the concepts, but all guns feel the same other than the sword, it has many bugs like weapons falling trough the ground etc. it would be one of the coolest games with a bit of work, but from now on i gotta give it 3 stars
review_5: It isnt fast passed the weapons are all the same apart from the sword which doesent have any swinging sound effects and the characters look so strange when you slice them. Bad, it had so much potential Respond to dev: Thanks for replying, I'll stay tuned, I think I'll like it soon.
